local_intent: Perceive the T-block, approach and align to it, set the tool yaw for lateral contact, and verify orientation before pushing.
assumptions: Yaw 90 degrees corresponds to the required lateral push orientation in this scene.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT subsequence: DetectObject(t_block) → ApproachAndAlign(t_block, 0.005, 1200) → SetTCPYaw(90) with a verification via AtOrientation(90) prior to the push actions.
